p: To provide an overview of studies that performed viral mNGS in common livestock including cattle, small ruminants (goats and sheep), poultry, and pigs, we performed a systematic review in five electronic databases (Embase, Medline, Cochrane Central, Web of Science, and Google Scholar) on 21 February 2019 using search terms such as “metagenomic,” “farm animals,” “livestock,” “virome,” and “high-throughput sequencing.” The detailed search strategy is described in the Supplementary Materials. All identified references were imported to Mendeley (available at https://www.mendeley.com/). Duplicated references were removed.
